channel.title: How to get a server online(for all those stupid questions about its not online)
channel.description:
OK,im kinda sick of all of the stupid"i try to post my server online it says its offline but i can get on it!"question's. :eek:
just go to the Tutorial section of the moparisthebest.com forums and click the link"How to make a tutorial to stop the questions"it'll be a sticky post,go to the port forwarding section.
Here's the part where it tells you how to port forward(obiously)follow those instuctions of the first post,once you port forward it should be online so you can post and so other people can get on your server now.
how this post help at least a little bit,tell me if there's any rules i broke.
i'm sincerely sry if there are any broken rules(i didnt see or notice any)not to be a suck up or anything lol :P.

item.title: How to get a server online(for all those stupid questions about its not online)
item.dc:creator: @redfrodude27 redfrodude27
item.description:
@redfrodude27 wrote:

Not really…If you can get on your server you already port forwarded…And if it says it is offline use your server IP!!!Not the blah.no-ip.biz use the 12.325.125.21 one that is shows on no-ip.com…And this is not help (you only ask for it)and it is no development so it is going to get locked…

Read full topic
